name: Beef and Black Bean Chili
description: Slowly simmered tomatoes are the best source of lycopene, a red pigment known to have anticancer properties.

ingredients.name: Guacamole Dip Mix or Chili Seasoning

preparation: Heat Multipurpose Pot to medium; add vegetable oil and cook ground beef for approximately 3 minutes. Add onion, celery and Guacamole Dip Mix. Stir well and continue cooking until beef is no longer pink.
Add diced tomatoes, black beans, tomato juice and frozen corn. Bring to a gentle simmer and cook for at least 15 minutes. Season with Sea Salt and Pepper before serving.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!

products.name: Chili Seasoning (1001136)
summary: Make classic, restaurant-quality chili at home with better-for-you ingredients.
